entry.title: Saturday: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy or freezing rain changing to freezing rain this morning then to snow or ice pellets this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
